member.name: T:ExtensionCreator.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ExtensionCreator.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ExtensionCreator.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

members.member:
If its a folder the path should be of the form \Directory1\Directory2\...\Directoryn, if its a file the path should be of the form \Directory1\Directory2\...\Directoryn\FileName.
The id of the task to retrieve the file or folder from. Uses the active file path if the file path is not specified.
TODO: optional. should use the FilePathAttribute to build the xpath query. TODO: not rigorously tested.
